messages.welcome: Welcome to Rock, Paper, Scissors, Spock, Lizard!
messages.speed_round_hint:
Pssst...if you pass an integer as an argument when running rps.js from the terminal, we'll play that number of speed rounds for you :)
 e.g. If you enter `node rps.js 12` into the terminal, we'll run 12 rounds automatically for you.
messages.speed_round_start:
~SPEED ROUND~
NOTE: Speed round results do not count towards all time match results.
messages.continue_message: Would you like to continue playing? Enter 1 for yes or 0 for no.
